## Gr√°ficos Descriptivos

```{r}
# Lectura de datos
bank2 <- read.csv("bank.csv")
```

```{r}
bank2 <- bank2 %>% 
            mutate(housing = case_when(housing == "yes" ~ "Housing = Yes",
                                       housing == "no" ~ "Housing = No"
                                       ))

ggplot(bank2, aes(marital, fill = loan)) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 6.5, angle = 0)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill",
           color="black") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c('#ff6347', '#7fff00')) +
  labs(y = "Porcentaje",
       x = "Grado") +
  facet_grid(housing ~ education)
```
